org.apache.giraph.counters

类 GiraphStats

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.giraph.counters.HadoopCountersBase
      • org.apache.giraph.counters.GiraphStats
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    Iterable<GiraphHadoopCounter>

    public class GiraphStats
extends HadoopCountersBase
    Hadoop Counters in group "Giraph Stats". General statistics about job.
